Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.listeners

Class MessageList

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.list.BaseList<Element>
com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.list.ObjectList<Message>
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.listeners.MessageList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, MessageCounter, Transceiver, Countable, Addable<Message>, Appendable<Message>, Indexable<Message>, Prependable<Message>, Sequence<Message>, Sized, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject, DoubleQuantizable, Quantizable, Stringable, StringSource, Instantiable<BaseList<Message>>, Iterable<Message>, Collection<Message>, List<Message>, RandomAccess
Direct Known Subclasses:
ValidationIssues
public class MessageList extends ObjectList<Message> implements MessageCounter
A list of messages that listens for and adds incoming messages. Only messages that are accepted by a Matcher (or Filter subclass) are added.

List Methods

This list of messages can be rebroadcast with Broadcaster.transmitAll(Iterable). A filtered list of messages can be retrieved with matching(Matcher) and a list of formatted messages with formatted().

Superinterface Methods

The superinterface MessageCounter provides methods that count messages and collect statistics.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
